original_title: เธอ…ร้องไห้เมื่อคืนนี้
overview: Khun Nu was always a good girl at home, paying polite attention to her parents. But she change when she got involved with a group of young women at the university. They partied and lived a dissolute wild life. Khun Nu fell in love with flirtatious young man, got pregnant and started to drink heavily. Things got violent an she was abandoned.
title: She Cried Last Night
